items.headline: GM’s stock is soaring as these factors drive a better profit forecast
items.summary_en: GM doesn’t anticipate tariff costs to be as steep as it previously expected. The automaker is also benefiting from higher prices, and says its move to trim EV production will pay off next year.

items.headline: ‘I would like to know the truth’: My stepgrandmother told me she left me her IRA. How do I find it?

items.headline: ‘A friend calls it the everything bubble’: Why do so many economists fear a 1929-style crash?

items.headline: Want to stream every NBA game this season? It’s going to cost you nearly $1,000.
